item.title: iOS 26: Save Physical Card Details in Wallet App
item.description: Apple’s Wallet app in iOS 26 includes a new feature that lets you store physical card information alongside your digital payment cards. This allows you to quickly access account numbers, expiry dates,

item.title: iPhone's Car Key Feature Set to Improve as Apple Tests Digital Key 4.0
